Series.Actors: |Tracy Spiridakos|Billy Burke|David Lyons|Mark Pellegrino|Stephen Collins|JD Pardo|Zak Orth|Maria Howell|Daniella Alonso|Graham Rogers|Elizabeth Mitchell|Tim Guinee|Giancarlo Esposito|
Series.Overview: Our entire way of life depends on electricity. So what would happen if it just stopped working? Well, one day, like a switch turned off, the world is suddenly thrust back into the dark ages. Planes fall from the sky, hospitals shut down, and communication is impossible. And without any modern technology, who can tell us why? Now, 15 years later, life is back to what it once was long before the industrial revolution: families living in quiet cul-de-sacs, and when the sun goes down lanterns and candles are lit. Life is slower and sweeter. Or is it? On the fringes of small farming communities, danger lurks. And a young woman's life is dramatically changed when a local militia arrives and kills her father, who mysteriously - and unbeknownst to her - had something to do with the blackout. This brutal encounter sets her and two unlikely companions off on a daring coming-of-age journey to find answers about the past in the hopes of reclaiming the future.

Episode.Overview: Get the lowdown on the premiere episode from the actors and creators of Revolution.
Cast and creators talk about the pendant, Danny as Neville's pawn and more.
Erik Kripke and the cast talk about the perils of perception and best intentions in this week's episode.
The show creators and cast talk about themes of redemption and sacrifice in "The Plague Dogs."
Eric Kripke and the cast talk about the mythological what if posed in "Soul Train."
Eric Kripke and the cast talk about themes of urgent choices in "Sex and Drugs."
Eric Kripke and the cast deconstruct the character of Revolution's reluctant - and guilty - hero, Miles Matheson.
Show creator Eric Kripke talks about Nora's mythology and the fun of writing for "bad guy" characters.
The heroes of Revolution walk into the belly of the beast.
Erik Kripke and the cast weigh in on the fall finale, Revolution's biggest episode to date!
Meet Militia Corporal Joseph Wheatley, working undercover to undermine the Rebels.
The Rebels have no idea there's a dangerous traitor among them...
Has Wheatley been turned or did the Militia mess up?
Feigning patriotism, Wheatley earns a promotion from the Rebels.
The forgotten Militia operative recalls the day the power went off.
Wheatley lays out his nefarious plan for Miles.
Monroe orders Neville to embark on a manhunt that will forever change the Republic.
Neville puts a velvet glove on his iron fist to shake down a madame for intel on Miles.
During his interrogation, a Militia conspirator tells Neville that Monroe isn't the man he used to be.
After he completed his investigation, will his unquenchable quest for truth lead Neville to death?
After promoting Neville, an eerily composed Monroe sends him on a mission to find Ben Matheson.
The cast and crew discuss the shocking twists in store for "The Stand".
Go behind the scenes with the cast on the set of "Ghosts."
The series creator and cast discuss Rachel's homicidal tendencies... and her secrets.
The cast and crew dive deep on Monroe's mania, Rachel's reparations and Miles' tragedy.
The cast and crew talk about Miles and Monroe's epic hometown showdown.
Cast and crew discuss Aaron's mysterious link to The Tower and the dangerous partnership of Miles and Neville.
Cast and creators talk romance - and unraveling - on "The Longest Day."
Cast and crew have the lowdown on Nora's interrogation, the Rebels' traitor and the latest on The Tower.
Cast and show creators unlock the secrets of The Tower
Get the backstory on the stunning season finale from Eric Kripke and the cast!

Episode.GuestStars: Brian Allison|Nelson Bonilla|Michael Duisenberg|Allan Graf|Morgan Hinkleman|Cameron Morrison|MacEwen Morrison|Brandon Molale|John Saint Ryan|Dan Southworth|Greg Sproles|Michael Stacy|Jeff Wolfe
Episode.Overview: A family struggles in an American landscape of empty cities, militias and freedom fighters, where every piece of technology has blacked out forever.

Episode.GuestStars: C. Thomas Howell|Maria Howell|David Meunier
Episode.Overview: In order to rescue Danny, Miles knows he and the gang will need help. Thus, the search begins for Nora, a rebel fighter battling against the Militia. Meanwhile, Aaron confides in Maggie and Danny lays witness to what Captain Neville is capable of.

Episode.GuestStars: Michael Mosley|Mark Pellegrino|Derek Webster
Episode.Overview: On the run from the Militia, Nora leads Miles and Charlie back to the Rebel camp. Aaron and Maggie search for Grace, and Danny stands up to one of Captain Nevilleâ€™s men.

Episode.GuestStars: Michael Bowen|David Meunier
Episode.Overview: After Charlie and Nora rescue Miles from Militia, they set off to meet Aaron and Maggie. Tracking Miles and Charlie at every turn is Nate. As the gang reunites and continues on their journey, unforeseeable challenges await.

Episode.GuestStars: Jeff Fahey|Ric Reitz|Kim Raver
Episode.Overview: As the gang nears Neville and his men, their hopes of finding Danny grow until a shocking discovery threatens to impede their efforts. Meanwhile, orders from Monroe have upped the value of Danny's life and Nora connects with a fellow Rebel.

Episode.GuestStars: David Andrews|David Meunier|Maureen Sebastian|Todd Stashwick
Episode.Overview: In order to save Nora from her injury, Miles leads the gang on a detour to visit an old acquaintance of his for medical support, but they quickly find themselves in unfriendly territory. Aaron recalls his meek history as he looks back at his pre/post-blackout life, and Neville delivers Danny to Monroe.

Episode.GuestStars: Maria Howell|Colin Ford|Joshua Cox|Conor O'Farrell|Colm Feore
Episode.Overview: When Charlie meets a boy who's suffered a plight similar to her own, she relates and longs to help him and his young friends. First, she must convince Miles. Meanwhile, Rachel grows weary of General Monroe as she meets someone from her past.

Episode.GuestStars: Maria Howell|Alyssa Diaz|Lacey Ellison|David Meunier|Ric Reitz|Colm Feore|Kim Raver|Aileen Davila
Episode.Overview: When Nora encounters a close relative, she must make a difficult choice between family and a promise. Meanwhile, one of the most ruthless members of the Militia is tracking Miles, Charlie and the gang and General Monroe hands Captain Neville a stern warning.

Episode.GuestStars: Reed Diamond|Conor O'Farrell|Maureen Sebastian|Nishi Munshi
Episode.Overview: Miles and the gang are bound for Monroe's lair - Independence Hall, but their efforts are impeded when they begin to have difficulty separating fantasy from reality. Meanwhile, Neville starts to grow suspicious of Rachel.

Episode.GuestStars: David Meunier|Mark Pellegrino|Glynn Turman|Kim Raver
Episode.Overview: In the gangâ€™s quest to rescue Danny, the time has come for Miles and Monroe to meet face to face. Meanwhile, on the verge of reuniting with her brother, Charlie is conflicted by a shocking discovery and Rachel tests Monroeâ€™s patience.

Episode.GuestStars: Leland Orser|Maria Howell|James Shanklin|Patrick St. Esprit|Derek Webster|Colm Feore
Episode.Overview: Miles leads the rebel squad out of Philadelphia and away from Monroeâ€™s helicopters and machine guns. Meanwhile, a guilt-ridden Rachel tries to redeem herself by providing power to the rebels, but once again must leave her children, Charlie and Danny, behind. As if there wasnâ€™t enough heat, romantic sparks ignite between Miles and Nora.

Episode.GuestStars: Leland Orser|Patrick St. Esprit|Glenn Morshower|Nestor Serrano|Derek Webster|Malik Yoba|Colm Feore |Crystal Martinez
Episode.Overview: A final act of heroism by one of their own saves the lives of Charlie and the gang, but the loss devastates everyone and they must carry on with heavy hearts but increased resolve. Miles sets out on a mission with Nora to recruit his former Militia comrade, Jim Hudson and enlist his savage killing skills. Meanwhile, Rachel looks for a power source and a way back into the heart of her daughter Charlie. Rachel also attempts to elude the grip of Randall Flynn, her ruthless former boss and ally of Monroe.

Episode.GuestStars: Derek Webster|Malik Yoba|Colm Feore|Kim Raver| Jasmine Kaur
Episode.Overview: Neville faces danger and hard choices as Monroe doubts his loyalty, he disowns his son Jason and gets captured by Miles. Rachel and Charlie begin slowly patching their relationship only to be pulled apart again as Rachel suddenly embarks on a quest to restore the power and her self-respect. She must make a dangerous journey to the mysterious Tower as it holds her only chance at redemption.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia
Episode.GuestStars: Kate Burton|Leslie Hope|Dayo Okeniyi
Episode.Overview: Paranoia strikes Monroe deeply as Neville disappears and Nevilleâ€™s son Jason makes a big decision. Meanwhile, the familial bond between Miles and Charlie grows stronger. Elsewhere, Miles experiences romantic attraction with both Rachel and Nora. Rachel sets off on her dangerous quest to infiltrate the Tower and restore power to the world before Monroe can ignite a nuclear device.

Episode.GuestStars: Leslie Hope|Mark Pellegrino|Maureen Sebastian|Annie Wersching|Malik Yoba
Episode.Overview: When the past catches up with Miles and Monroe in the form of mutual heartthrob, Emma all hell breaks loose for them physically and emotionally. Charlie and Nora are the ones who rescue Miles this time. Meanwhile Aaronâ€™s life is turned inside out while accompanying Rachel on her tenacious trek to the mysterious Tower where she plans to restore the power.

Episode.GuestStars: Maria Howell|Jason Brooks|Timothy Busfield|Michael Gladis|Tom Nowicki|James Shanklin|Colm Feore
Episode.Overview: Miles and Tom Neville find themselves fighting for the same cause but Miles still doesnâ€™t trust him. Charlie, Jason and Nora attempt to pull off a daring river rescue of Dr. Stephen Camp to keep deadly anthrax out of the hands of Monroe. Meanwhile Rachel and Aaron are captured and threatened by Militia forces.

Episode.GuestStars: Leslie Hope|Rus Blackwell|Robert Neary|Mark Pellegrino
Episode.Overview: Romantic connections heat up between two couples â€” Miles and Nora and Charlie and Jason â€” but disastrous drone strikes from the Militia threaten them all. An assassination attempt on Monroe heightens his paranoia and Georgia Federation President Foster contemplates surrender. Meanwhile, Rachel and Aaron push through the Plains Nation into Colorado.

Episode.GuestStars: Leland Orser|Rus Blackwell|Patrick St. Esprit|Ramon Fernandez|Glenn Morshower|Malik Yoba|Colm Feore|Tarek F. Alame
Episode.Overview: A captive Nora is tortured and left for dead. Monroe learns of Rachaelâ€™s attempt to reach the Tower but is unaware of her deadly plan for him. Meanwhile, Miles is desperate to find out how so many of his close associates are being brutally murdered. Later, Miles, Charlie, Neville, Jason, Hudson and Sanborn struggle to make it out of the Plains Nation to join Rachel and save her from what they believe to be certain death.

Episode.GuestStars: Maria Howell|Omid Abtahi|Ramon Fernandez|Glenn Morshower|Colm Feore
Episode.Overview: Rachel and Monroe battle with more than wits. Meanwhile, Miles, Charlie, Nora and Aaron get inside the Tower but Tom Neville and son Jason get shut out. Miles and Monroe once again face-off, this time even more lethally.

Episode.GuestStars: Maria Howell|Leslie Hope|Omid Abtahi|Ramon Fernandez|Glenn Morshower|Maureen Sebastian|Kim Raver|Colm Feore
Episode.Overview: Life-threatening dangers abound on all sides as the Rebels infiltrate the Tower. Miles' leadership abilities and character are sorely tested as well as his feelings for Rachel and Nora. Aaron's genius comes in handy while Tom Neville and Randall Flynn bring new meaning to the dark side.

Episode.GuestStars: Adam Beach|Jessica Collins|Patrick Heusinger|Blake Hood|Nicole Ari Parker|Matt Ross|Natalie Kline|Aidan Sullivan
Episode.Overview: Our heroes made the treacherous journey to the Tower and were able to turn on the power, but at what cost? The effects of this move prove to be catastrophic for everyone. Now, Miles, Aaron and Rachel have found themselves in a mysterious small town, in the great nation of Texas where Rachel unexpectedly encounters an important figure from her past. Charlie finds herself on a mission in the Plains Nation while Neville and Jason search a refugee camp for a lost loved one. Meanwhile, Monroe has discovered a gritty role in his new environment.

Episode.GuestStars: Adam Beach|Jessica Collins|Patrick Heusinger|Richard T. Jones|Nicole Ari Parker|Matt Ross
Episode.Overview: Miles' life is in grave danger as he finds himself in the clutches of Titus Andover. Charlie is determined to find Monroe, as Rachel and her father, Dr. Porter desperately attempt to revive Aaron. Meanwhile, Neville hatches a plan to infiltrate the Patriots.

Episode.GuestStars: Jessica Collins|Patrick Heusinger|Richard T. Jones|Nicole Ari Parker|Matt Ross
Episode.Overview: Rachel makes a valiant attempt to rescue Miles and to escape with an ailing Tribesman's wife, while Neville and Jason are caught off-guard, assaulted by violent refugees. Charlie and Adam are at odds over what to do with Monroe. Legions of Tribesmen threaten all of Willoughby but with questionable leadership and Aaron faces death, yet again.

Episode.GuestStars: Jessica Collins|Steven Culp|Richard T. Jones|Nicole Ari Parker|Matt Ross
Episode.Overview: Monroe and Charlie's dynamic begins to evolve. Meanwhile, wounds of Miles and Rachel begin to heal, yet her curiosity and heightened awareness could be her undoing. Neville's manipulation of Patriot power brokers makes Machiavelli look like a cherub and Aaron's mind works overtime awake or asleep with mind-blowing effectiveness. Rachel and Miles begin planning a resistance to what they believe might be the Patriot occupation.

Episode.GuestStars: Jim Beaver|Jessica Collins|Steven Culp|Nicole Ari Parker|Adam Sinclair|Barry Tubb
Episode.Overview: Aaron and Rachel speculate on the extreme effects of Nano technology, while he also confides in Cynthia. Meanwhile a figure from Milesâ€™ rugged past, Texas Ranger John Fry reemerges. Fry could be Milesâ€™ chance to bring down the Patriots in a big way, however Fry will need convincing. Charlie has a surprise for Miles and her mother, while Secretary Allenford holds a secret important to Neville.

Episode.GuestStars: Jim Beaver|Steven Culp|Zeljko Ivanek|Nicole Ari Parker|Anthony Ruivivar|Barry Tubb|Alanna Ubach
Episode.Overview: As Charlie, Rachel and Gene question Monroeâ€™s true allegiance, Miles himself is weary of his former friendâ€™s intentions. Meanwhile, Aaron continues to have visions that lead to endless questions.

Episode.GuestStars: Jessica Collins|Steven Culp|Zeljko Ivanek|Nicole Ari Parker|Waleed Zuaiter
Episode.Overview: When Rachel discovers some unsettling truths, Miles does what he does best to overcome obstacles before him and those he cares about. Meanwhile, Charlie shares a moment with her mom as Neville and Jason continue with their struggles between father and son.

Episode.GuestStars: David Aaron Baker|Jessica Collins|Steven Culp|Zeljko Ivanek|Nicole Ari Parker
Episode.Overview: As Miles and the gang try to escape the perils of their current situation, Rachel and Gene continue to struggle with their relationship, which affects Charlie. Meanwhile, Neville takes a gamble with the Patriots.

Episode.GuestStars: David Aaron Baker|Jessica Collins|Christopher Cousins|Zeljko Ivanek|Aidan Sussman|Waleed Zuaiter
Episode.Overview: The relationship between Rachel and Gene remains strained as Charlie shows her mom how much she's grown. Meanwhile, Neville gives Jason a determined proclamation.

Episode.GuestStars: David Aaron Baker|Christopher Cousins|Steven Culp|Maria Howell|Mat Vairo|Waleed Zuaiter|Kim Raver
Episode.Overview: When Miles leads Monroe and Rachel south of the border; they're met with much more than they bargained for as Neville and Julia dance a delicate dance. Meanwhile, Charlie and Gene continue their search for Aaron.

Episode.GuestStars: Joaquim de Almeida|Christopher Cousins|Steven Culp|Maria Howell|Maureen Sebastian|Mat Vairo|Kim Raver
Episode.Overview: Monroe finds himself in unfamiliar territory and must make a choice about his son, Conner while Neville and Julia continue to tango at Jason's dismay. Meanwhile, Gene leads Charlie to an uneasy discovery.

Episode.GuestStars: Jessica Collins|Christopher Cousins|Steven Culp|Maureen Sebastian|Mat Vairo|Kim Raver
Episode.Overview: When Gene decides to assist the town of Willoughby, Rachel and Charlie feel compelled to help too as Miles and Monroe continue to join forces in order to survive.

Episode.GuestStars: Katie Aselton|Steven Culp|Daniel Henney|Bret Michaels|Maureen Sebastian|Timm Sharp|Cotter Smith|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: Monroe leads Connor and Charlie on a risky mission, as Miles and Rachel keep an eye on things in Willoughby. Meanwhile, Neville gets a new assignment and Aaron reunites with an old friend.

Episode.GuestStars: Katie Aselton|Jessica Collins|Christopher Cousins|Daniel Henney|Maureen Sebastian|Timm Sharp|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: With their lives in danger in New Vegas, Monroe and Connor face a difficult decision in order to survive. Back in Willoughby, Miles questions whether he can trust Neville and Jason to help take down the Patriots. Meanwhile, Aaron and Priscilla find themselves at odds over the nano code.

Episode.GuestStars: Daniel Henney|Zeljko Ivanek|Maureen Sebastian|Chris Hayes
Episode.Overview: Aaron awakes to find himself in a world with power, married to Priscilla and running his company. As he gets the feeling that something isn't quite right, familiar faces begin to appear.

Episode.GuestStars: Tyrees Allen|David Aaron Baker|Christopher Cousins|Steven Culp|Maureen Sebastian|Cotter Smith|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: Monroe, Charlie and Connor make their way back to Willoughby, where they find that the Patriots' reeducation center is up and running. An encounter with two of the center's young cadets leaves Rachel and Miles divided on the lengths they are willing to go in order to take down the Patriots. As Neville and Jason find a new ally for their mission, more about the history of the Patriots is revealed.

Episode.GuestStars: Reiko Aylesworth|Christopher Cousins|Steven Culp|Billy Lush|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: While Dr. Porter and Miles venture into Willoughby in search of allies within the town, Monroe seizes an opportunity to surprise the Patriots. Nevilleâ€™s political maneuverings put him and Jason in serious danger.

Episode.GuestStars: M.C. Gainey|Billy Lush|Gonzalo Menendez|Anthony Ruivivar|Maureen Sebastian|Barry Tubb|Mat Vairo|Liz Tabish
Episode.Overview: Frustrated with Neville, Jason turns to Miles with crucial information about the Patriotsâ€™ next steps for Texas. Determined to derail the Patriotsâ€™ plans, Miles and Monroe rush to Austin with Jason, Charlie and Connor in tow. Meanwhile, Aaron grows suspicious of Priscillaâ€™s increasingly unusual behavior.

Episode.GuestStars: Tim Guinee|Maureen Sebastian|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: As Miles, Monroe, Charlie and Connor rush to escape Austin, a confrontation with Texas Rangers separates Miles from the group. While out searching for Miles, Charlie is confronted by Neville who demands information on Jasonâ€™s whereabouts. As a wounded Miles faces increasingly hopeless circumstances, Aaron learns that the nanotech has been busy.

Episode.GuestStars: Reiko Aylesworth|Steven Culp|Billy Lush|Maureen Sebastian|Cotter Smith|Waleed Zuaiter|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: Truman, empowered with new authority from the President, launches a mustard gas attack designed to kill Miles and Monroe. To Rachel's disappointment, Miles agrees to join Monroe in a ruthless plot to beat the Patriots at their own game. As Neville faces his own challenge from the Patriots, Aaron grows increasingly alarmed by the power of the nanotech.

Episode.GuestStars: Reiko Aylesworth|Steven Culp|Colby French|Billy Lush|Anthony Ruivivar|Maureen Sebastian|Cotter Smith|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: United by their desire to take the Patriots down, Neville and Monroe form an uneasy alliance. As Rachel comes face-to-face with the nano-tech while searching for Aaron, things don't go according to plan for Miles, Charlie and Gene when they try to steal the Patriots' supply of mustard gas.

Episode.GuestStars: Reiko Aylesworth|Steven Culp|Colby French|M.C. Gainey|Billy Lush|Anthony Ruivivar|Maureen Sebastian|Cotter Smith|Barry Tubb|Mat Vairo
Episode.Overview: Miles, Charlie and Monroe launch an attack on the Patriots, but must improvise a risky new plan in order to halt the oncoming war between California and Texas. Out for revenge, Neville sets his sights on President Davis. Meanwhile, Aaron and Rachelâ€™s efforts to save Priscilla from the nano-tech has unexpected consequences.
